fields.name: count
fields.description: Count - shots to fire in total

fields.name: delay
fields.description: Delay - interval between each shot, in seconds

fields.name: cols
fields.description: Columns - this many shots appear in a row

fields.name: padX
fields.description: Horizontal padding - two shots have this many pixels between them

fields.name: padY
fields.description: Vertical padding - two rows of shots have this many pixels between them

fields.name: gainX
fields.description: Max vertical gain - each shot appears +/- by this many pixels

fields.name: gainY
fields.description: Max horizontal gain - each shot appears +/- by this many pixels

fields.name: jitterX
fields.description: Horizontal jitter - each shot height is offset by this many pixels

fields.name: jitterY
fields.description: Vertical jitter - each shot height is offset by this many pixels

fields.name: sound
fields.description: Sound effect - plays with the animation in battle only

fields.name: key
fields.description: The key of this object used in code -- don't change these!

fields.name: subfolder
fields.description: Used to subcategorize objects ("/bosses" or "/areas/towns" for instance)

fields.name: name
fields.description: The display name of this object, used only by humans like you

fields.name: description
fields.description: Notes and whatnot on this object
